articles.title: Palestinians Hand Bullet That Killed Al Jazeera Journalist To US - NDTV
articles.description: The Palestinian Authority has handed the bullet that killed prominent Palestinian-American Al Jazeera journalist Shireen Abu Akleh to USauthorities for forensic examination, a Palestinian official said on Saturday.
articles.content:
The Al Jazeera journalist's death sparked Palestinian outrage and international condemnation. (File)

articles.title: Palestinians to let US examine bullet that killed Al Jazeera journalist Shireen Abu Akleh - CNN
articles.description: The Palestinian Authority will allow US investigators to examine the bullet that killed Palestinian-American journalist Shireen Abu Akleh, PA Attorney General Akram Al Khatib announced Saturday.

articles.title: Hundreds of flights axed as US kicks off long holiday weekend - CNA

articles.content:
The travel chaos has drawn scrutiny from Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg and others in Washington.
